creator: Uswitch Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Switch everything today and save up to £912* this year.

If you manage all your utility bills here, you’ll never lose out when your deals come to an end. That’s because we’ll send you free reminders when it’s time to switch and save again.

Get more out of your switch when you use the award-winning Uswitch app. It takes minutes to get an energy comparison - all you need to do is scan your bill’s QR code for instant results. When it comes to broadband and mobile, switching to a faster, cheaper deal that works for you couldn’t be easier.

What you get:

Whether you’re trying to beat the price cap or move off your standard variable tariff, it’s a simple task to find and switch to a new energy deal using the app.

• Scan your way to savings — It’s easier than ever to run an energy comparison! Just scan your bill’s QR code for instant, bespoke results and you could save up to £479**
• Compare and switch anywhere, anytime — Compare the market to find the plan that works for you, then switch to it in minutes
• Track your switch progress — You can track your progress of your energy switch, from start to finish, at any time

My Bills — Add your utility bills, and we’ll notify you when it’s time to switch again and lock in your savings for another year.

• Manage all of your bills in one place — Easily add your energy, broadband, and mobile bills
• Get reminders — We’ll let you know when it’s time to switch again, so you don’t get bill shock when your contract ends

Whether you want to stream, surf or scroll, you need the right broadband deal. Don’t let slow speeds drag you down - find the deal that meets your needs here.

• Exclusive deals — Get access to exclusive deals from leading broadband and TV providers when you switch through the app
• Pay less, get more — From Game Of Thrones to Sky Sports, get more of the shows and channels you love for less
• One stop comparison — Compare broadband speeds and TV channels across multiple packages from top broadband and TV providers

Why overpay for your phone? Whether you’re after more data, minutes or texts, there’s a new phone or SIM-only deal that should match your needs.

• Flexibility & control — 30 day SIM only contracts give you the freedom to compare and switch to a better deal whenever you like
• Better deals — Compare all major networks, including O2, Vodafone, Three, EE, Virgin Mobile, giffgaff and more starting from £5 per month
• No credit? No problem — Compare great-value, SIM only plans that don’t require a credit check or contract
• Looking for a new phone — You can compare the best-selling mobile phone deals from the UK’s biggest networks right here

Get more with the right credit card. Compare options to get cashback, avoid interest, spread costs and enjoy attractive exchange rates when you finally take that trip.

• Get cashback and reward points — Earn store loyalty points, air miles or cash as you spend
• Avoid interest — Transfer your existing debts to 0% interest credit card and avoid interest for months or even years
• Spread the cost of spending — Big purchase in mind? Find a 0% interest card, so you can spread the cost of any purchase over several months
• Free overseas use — Been burned using your card abroad? Get near “perfect” market exchange rates with a card that lets you avoid sneaky “overseas use” fees

* £912 is the average amount saved by Uswitch users who switch their energy, broadband and mobile phone contracts, plus shifting some credit card debt to a balance transfer card. These figures were calculated between 1 Jul 2019 and 31 Dec 2019.
** Between 1 Jul 2019 and 31 Dec 2019, at least 10% of people who switched energy supplier for both gas & electricity with uSwitch saved £479 or more.
descriptionShort: Compare deals on energy, mobile and broadband. Track, manage and save on bills.

title: Uswitch compare, switch and sa

creator: Uswitch Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Utrack by Uswitch

A new service to help you manage your home energy costs.

• Track your energy across the day and monitor changes in your energy spend
• Get dynamic energy insights, such as peak usage times
• Calculate potential savings with handy household tips

The Uswitch app has been given a refresh. This new-look service now gives you more features focused on controlling your home energy, which could help you reduce the cost of your household bills. This is Utrack by Uswitch.

We know saving money is important to you, especially as living costs continue to rise. That’s why we want to do more than just help you switch.

Here’s what you can do on Utrack, the new service from Uswitch:

• Connect your smart meter to get automated updates and personalised dynamic insights on your home energy usage

• See how much you could save by changing your energy habits

• Check your progress over time and see how your usage compares to others

• Learn how energy efficient your home is

You can still use the Uswitch app to access switching for your broadband and mobile phone.

• Exclusive deals — Get access to exclusive deals from leading broadband and TV providers when you switch
• Pay less, get more — From Game Of Thrones to Sky Sports, get more of the shows and channels you love for less
• One stop comparison — Compare broadband speeds and TV channels across multiple packages from top broadband and TV providers
Why overpay for your phone? Whether you’re after more data, minutes or texts, there’s a new phone or SIM-only deal that should match your needs.
• Flexibility & control — 30 day SIM only contracts give you the freedom to compare and switch to a better deal whenever you like
• Better deals — Compare all major networks, including O2, Vodafone, Three, EE, Virgin Mobile, giffgaff and more starting from £5 per month
• No credit? No problem — Compare great-value, SIM only plans that don’t require a credit check or contract
• Looking for a new phone — You can compare the best-selling mobile phone deals from the UK’s biggest networks right here

• Track your energy across the day and monitor changes in your energy spend
• Get dynamic energy insights, such as peak usage times
• Calculate potential savings with handy household tips

The Uswitch app has been given a refresh. This new-look service now gives you more features focused on controlling your home energy, which could help you reduce the cost of your household bills. This is Utrack by Uswitch.

We know saving money is important to you, especially as living costs continue to rise. That’s why we want to do more than just help you switch.

Here’s what you can do on Utrack, the new service from Uswitch:

• Connect your smart meter to get automated updates and personalised dynamic insights on your home energy usage

• See how much you could save by changing your energy habits

• Check your progress over time and see how your usage compares to others

• Learn how energy efficient your home is

You can still use the Uswitch app to access switching for your broadband and mobile phone.

• Exclusive deals — Get access to exclusive deals from leading broadband and TV providers when you switch
• Pay less, get more — From Game Of Thrones to Sky Sports, get more of the shows and channels you love for less
• One stop comparison — Compare broadband speeds and TV channels across multiple packages from top broadband and TV providers
Why overpay for your phone? Whether you’re after more data, minutes or texts, there’s a new phone or SIM-only deal that should match your needs.
• Flexibility & control — 30 day SIM only contracts give you the freedom to compare and switch to a better deal whenever you like
• Better deals — Compare all major networks, including O2, Vodafone, Three, EE, Virgin Mobile, giffgaff and more starting from £5 per month
• No credit? No problem — Compare great-value, SIM only plans that don’t require a credit check or contract
• Looking for a new phone — You can compare the best-selling mobile phone deals from the UK’s biggest networks right here

A new service to help you manage your home energy costs.

• Track your energy across the day and monitor changes in your energy spend
• Get dynamic energy insights, such as peak usage times
• Calculate potential savings with handy household tips

The Uswitch app has been given a refresh. This new-look service now gives you more features focused on controlling your home energy, which could help you reduce the cost of your household bills. This is Utrack by Uswitch.

We know saving money is important to you, especially as living costs continue to rise. That’s why we want to do more than just help you switch.

Here’s what you can do on Utrack, the new service from Uswitch:

• Connect your smart meter to get automated updates and personalised dynamic insights on your home energy usage

• See how much you could save by changing your energy habits

• Check your progress over time and see how your usage compares to others

• Learn how energy efficient your home is

You can still use the Uswitch app to access switching for your broadband and mobile phone.

• Exclusive deals — Get access to exclusive deals from leading broadband and TV providers when you switch
• Pay less, get more — From Game Of Thrones to Sky Sports, get more of the shows and channels you love for less
• One stop comparison — Compare broadband speeds and TV channels across multiple packages from top broadband and TV providers
Why overpay for your phone? Whether you’re after more data, minutes or texts, there’s a new phone or SIM-only deal that should match your needs.
• Flexibility & control — 30 day SIM only contracts give you the freedom to compare and switch to a better deal whenever you like
• Better deals — Compare all major networks, including O2, Vodafone, Three, EE, Virgin Mobile, giffgaff and more starting from £5 per month
• No credit? No problem — Compare great-value, SIM only plans that don’t require a credit check or contract
• Looking for a new phone — You can compare the best-selling mobile phone deals from the UK’s biggest networks right here
